title: Emerald Radiance Haaram - A Timeless Statement Piece
materials: Burmese Ruby accent stone. Crafted with Hyderabadi Kundan setting techniques.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a cascading design, meticulously studded with brilliant-cut diamonds. The central pendant boasts a captivating Zambian Emerald, surrounded by a halo of diamonds in a classic Kundan setting. Delicate emerald and diamond drops enhance the necklace's graceful movement. A single Burmese Ruby provides a striking contrast at the center flower piece.
occasions: and milestone events. Its timeless elegance makes it suitable for both traditional Telugu ceremonies like Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం)
description: This Emerald Radiance Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian artistry with contemporary design sensibilities. The brilliance of the diamonds and the rich color of the Zambian Emerald create a captivating focal point. This heirloom-quality piece is crafted with utmost precision, ensuring lasting beauty and value. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and modern attire.
